languages.text: {n}Кощунственное изучение Знания ксеносов, предпринятое в рамках дознания, привело к серии еретических актов творения — утратившие стойкость магосы стремились применить секреты эльдаров в своих изысканиях. Провинившиеся были сервиторизированы, а результаты их трудов помещены в охраняемый запретный каталог.{/n}

{n}The blasphemous study of xenos Knowledge undertaken as part of the investigation led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the tempted minds of the Magi sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden catalogue.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кощунственное изучение Знания ксеносов, предпринятое в рамках дознания, привело к серии еретических актов творения — утратившие стойкость магосы стремились применить секреты эльдаров в своих изысканиях. Провинившиеся были сервиторизированы, а результаты их трудов помещены в охраняемый запретный каталог.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The blasphemous research of the xenos' Knowledge, undertaken as part of the interrogation, has led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the weakened minds of the magos have sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected forbidden catalogue.{/n}

{n}The blasphemous research of the xenos' Knowledge, undertaken as part of the interrogation, has led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the weakened minds of the magos have sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected forbidden catalogue.{/n}

{n}The blasphemous study of xenos Knowledge undertaken as part of the investigation led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the tempted minds of the Magi sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden catalogue.{/n}

{n}The blasphemous research of xenos Knowledge, undertaken as part of the interrogation, has led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the weakened minds of the Magos sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden directory.{/n}

{n}The blasphemous research of xenos Knowledge, undertaken as part of the interrogation, has led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the weakened minds of the Magos sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden directory.{/n}

{n}The blasphemous study of xenos Knowledge undertaken as part of the investigation led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the tempted minds of the Magi sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden catalogue.{/n}

{n}The blasphemous study of xenos Knowledge undertaken as part of the investigation led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the tempted minds of the Magi sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden catalogue.{/n}

{n}The blasphemous study of xenos Knowledge undertaken as part of the investigation led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the tempted minds of the Magi sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden catalogue.{/n}

languages.text: {n}此次研究的过程中包含了对异形知识的亵渎性研究，而这样的研究最终导致了一系列异端创造行为。那些受到诱惑的贤者打算将艾达灵族的秘密应用到他们的研究中。这些异端分子被改造成了机仆，而他们的研究成果则被存在了受保护的禁忌类别之中。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blasphemous study of xenos Knowledge undertaken as part of the investigation led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the tempted minds of the Magi sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden catalogue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}此次研究的过程中包含了对异形知识的亵渎性研究，而这样的研究最终导致了一系列异端创造行为。那些受到诱惑的贤者打算将艾达灵族的秘密应用到他们的研究中。这些异端分子被改造成了机仆，而他们的研究成果则被存在了受保护的禁忌类别之中。{/n}
{n}此次研究的过程中包含了对异形知识的亵渎性研究，而这样的研究最终导致了一系列异端创造行为。那些受到诱惑的贤者打算将艾达灵族的秘密应用到他们的研究中。这些异端分子被改造成了机仆，而他们的研究成果则被存在了受保护的禁忌目录之中。{/n}

languages.text: {n}El estudio blasfemo de conocimientos xenos, parte de la investigación, condujo a una serie de creaciones heréticas: las mentes de los magos tentados ansiaban aplicar los secretos de los Aeldari a sus propias pesquisas. Los culpables fueron servidorizados y los resultados de su trabajo se registraron en un catálogo protegido y prohibido.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blasphemous study of xenos Knowledge undertaken as part of the investigation led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the tempted minds of the Magi sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden catalogue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}El estudio blasfemo de conocimientos xenos, parte de la investigación, condujo a una serie de creaciones heréticas: las mentes de los magos tentados ansiaban aplicar los secretos de los Aeldari a sus propias pesquisas. Los culpables fueron servidorizados y los resultados de su trabajo se registraron en un catálogo protegido y prohibido.{/n}

languages.text: {n}尋問の一環として行われたゼノの知識についての冒涜的な研究は、異端的な創造行為につながった...マゴスの誘惑された心が弱体化したため、アエルダリの秘密を自分たちの研究に応用しようとしたのだ。犯人たちは従者とされ、その作業の結果は保護された禁断の目録に保管された。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blasphemous study of xenos Knowledge undertaken as part of the investigation led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the tempted minds of the Magi sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden catalogue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}尋問の一環として行われたゼノの知識についての冒涜的な研究は、異端的な創造行為につながった...マゴスの心が弱体化したため、アエルダリの秘密を自分たちの研究に応用しようとしたのだ。犯人たちは従者とされ、その作業の結果は保護された禁断のディレクトリに保管された。{/n}
{n}尋問の一環として行われたゼノの知識についての冒涜的な研究は、異端的な創造行為につながった...マゴスの心が弱体化したため、アエルダリの秘密を自分たちの研究に応用しようとしたのだ。犯人たちは従者とされ、その作業の結果は保護された禁断のディレクトリに保管された。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Les recherches blasphématoires portant sur les connaissances xénos, entreprises dans le cadre des investigations, mènent à une série de créations hérétiques, car les esprits affaiblis des magi cherchent à appliquer les secrets des Aeldaris à leurs recherches. Les coupables voient grossir les rangs des servitors, et le fruit de leur travail est remisé dans un catalogue protégé et interdit d'accès.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blasphemous study of xenos Knowledge undertaken as part of the investigation led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the tempted minds of the Magi sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden catalogue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Les recherches blasphématoires portant sur les connaissances xénos, entreprises dans le cadre des investigations, mènent à une série de créations hérétiques, car les esprits affaiblis des magi cherchent à appliquer les secrets des Aeldaris à leurs recherches. Les coupables voient grossir les rangs des servitors, et le fruit de leur travail est remisé dans un catalogue protégé et interdit d'accès.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das blasphemische Studium von Xenos-Wissen, das als Teil der Untersuchung erfolgt ist, hat zu einer Reihe ketzerischer Schöpfungsakte geführt. Der verführte Verstand der Magi wollte die Geheimnisse der Aeldari auf ihre eigene Forschung anwenden. Die Sünder wurden servitorisiert und die Ergebnisse ihrer Arbeit in einem geschützten, verbotenen Katalog deponiert.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blasphemous study of xenos Knowledge undertaken as part of the investigation led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the tempted minds of the Magi sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden catalogue.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das blasphemische Studium von Xenos-Wissen, das als Teil der Untersuchung erfolgt ist, hat zu einer Reihe ketzerischer Schöpfungsakte geführt. Der verführte Verstand der Magi wollte die Geheimnisse der Aeldari auf ihre eigene Forschung anwenden. Die Sünder wurden servitorisiert und die Ergebnisse ihrer Arbeit in einem geschützten, verbotenen Katalog deponiert.{/n}

{n}Die blasphemische Erforschung von Xenos-Wissen, die als Teil des Verhörs erfolgt ist, hat zu einer Reihe ketzerischer Schöpfungsakte geführt. Der geschwächte Verstand der Magi wollte die Geheimnisse der Aeldari auf ihre eigene Forschung anwenden. Die Sünder wurden servitorisiert und die Ergebnisse ihrer Arbeit in einem geschützten, verbotenen Verzeichnis gelagert.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Soruşturmanın bir parçası olarak günah işleme pahasına yürütülen zeno irfanı incelemeleri, birtakım kâfirce icadın keşfine yol açtı. Magosların meyleden zihinleri, Aeldari sırlarını araştırmalarında kullanmaya kalkıştı. İşin ardındakiler hizmetörleştirildi ve araştırma sonuçları, muhafaza edilmek üzere yasaklı bir kataloğa yerleştirildi.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The blasphemous study of xenos Knowledge undertaken as part of the investigation led to a series of heretical acts of creation — the tempted minds of the Magi sought to apply the secrets of the Aeldari to their research. The culprits were servitorised and the results of their work placed in a protected, forbidden catalogue.{/n}

Magosların meyleden zihinleri, Aeldari sırlarını araştırmalarında kullanmaya kalkıştı. İşin ardındakiler hizmetörleştirildi ve araştırma sonuçları, muhafaza edilmek üzere yasaklı bir kataloğa yerleştirildi.{/n}
